page.title: 07SACRISTON LOCAL MAGAZINE
page.content:
"Spark"is a free community newspaper catering for the areas around Sacriston and Witton Gilbert. The interview was given by the editorial board. Q.Who finances the magazine ? A.It is self financed. Q.Who makes and prints the magazine ? A.It is compiled and edited by nine adult volunteers and the printing is organised by a local man .
Q.How long has the magazine been running ? A.It has been running for 16 weeks. Q.do you get enough information for the magazine ? A.Yes each issue has been increased,we started with 24 pages and now have 32. Q.What is the magazine based on ? A.It is based on village life .
